meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Nelson Jason Shore Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6543.

td.p: Paul Nelson, a Senate staff aide originally from Iowa City, Iowa
Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan

tr.td: FROM THE GREEK
GINGHAM STYLE
BOOK TITLE CHARACTERS' LAST NAMES
(Alex: We'll give you the first name to help you.)
OLYMPIC HOST CITIES
PLANE SPEAKING
THE LEFTY

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This form of Egyptian writing gets its name from Greek for "pertaining to sacred writing"

tr.td: Stephanie
Jason
Paul
(Alex: In the first one, we are dealing with quotations from the novel...)
FROM ZORBA THE GREEK
SCIENCE
CROSSWORD CLUES "J"
THE 4 ELEMENTS
PRESIDENTIAL ACQUISITIONS
THE LATE, GREAT COMEDIAN
